subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: For the first time in decades, the Royals, who endured 17 of 18 losing seasons before last year, begin a season with a realistic chance at the postseason, and all the pressure that comes with it.
snippet: For the first time in decades, the Royals, who endured 17 of 18 losing seasons before last year, begin a season with a realistic chance at the postseason, and all the pressure that comes with it.
